channel.title: RSCA Source related question
channel.description:
I notice if you spam just normal chat messages you get kicked from the server after 5 or so messages. Where do I look to change it so spam = no kick?
Thanks in advanced.

item.title: RSCA Source related question
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

Miles`:

They actually fixed it somewhere because players could spam the letter ‘a’ and get kicked from the server while PKing.

The ‘fix’ wasn’t in the source that was used to start MoparRSC…

Read full topic

item.title: RSCA Source related question
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

The addMessageToQueue method in the Player class.

It should look like this:

public void addMessageToChatQueue(byte[] messageData) { if (chatQueue.size() <= 2) { chatQueue.add(new ChatMessage(this, messageData)); } }

I have no clue why they decided to kill the player, instead of just ignoring the message… If someone was flooding the server with too many packets then they should have another part of the application detecting that, and disconnecting them (there already is, see addPacket method in the Player class).

Read full topic
